McKinsey Vietnam: Associate

08 May 2012
About McKinsey & Company:</strong></strong></td>
</tr>

McKinsey & Company is a management consulting firm whose mission is to help leaders make distinctive, lasting, and substantial improvements in performance, and constantly build a great firm that attracts, develops, excites, and retains exceptional people.</strong>

We have set the standards of excellence in top management consulting for more than 80 years. We advise decision makers in leading companies, the public sector, non-profit organizations, and innovative, fast-growing start-ups around the globe. In Germany alone, approximately 2,000 employees are dedicated to fulfilling our mission: to help clients achieve substantial and lasting improve­ments in their performance.</strong>

</div></td>
</tr>

Job scope:</strong>

  • Apply a broad range of creative problem-solving skills, combining technical and analytical excellence to help solve their piece of the overall client puzzle. </strong></li>
  • Synthesize conclusions into recommendations and work directly with senior client leaders to implement change.</li>
  • Gain broad exposure to a variety of different industries and functional areas, which could include, but are not limited to: pharmaceuticals, retail, and telecommunications on issues such as operations, organization, strategy, and technology.</li>
  • Work closely with senior client executives and McKinsey colleagues in one of our most entrepreneurial environments, and help to develop sector-shaping and nation-transforming programs.</li>
  • Based in Hanoi, Vietnam</li>
    </ul>
    </td>
    </tr>

Skills:</strong></td>
</tr>

  • Strong persuasive communication skill</li>
  • Excellent command of English</li>
  • Extensive experience in rolling out implementation on a large scale and project management</li>
  • Superior problem solving and analytical skills</li>
  • Willing to work in a highly demanding and result-oriented team environment</li>
  • Exhibit self-motivation and highly service-orientated work ethic</li>
  • Demonstrated leadership</li>
  • Outstanding analytical and conceptual skills</li>
  • Other intrinsic skills: </strong>strategic management perspective, knowledge of business trends in Asia, strong interpersonal and communication skills, eagerness to travel and experience different cultures.</li>
    </ul>
    </td>
    </tr>

Qualifications: Requirements:</strong>

  • MBA from top business school or Advanced Professional Degree</li>
  • Minimum of 2 years of working experience</li>
  • Excellent university degree</li>
    </ul>
